title: Language Use Strategy Design for EFL Teachers: Customized Pedagogical Approaches for Pre-Service Elementary Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English pedagogy and understanding of elementary education curriculum
context.additional_context: A program for prospective elementary teachers on applying English language use strategies in the science curriculum context

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three or more English speech characteristics (formal, interactive, native language-linked) appropriate for elementary learners' language proficiency
Learners can compare and analyze teachers' language use strategies for high- and low-ability learners based on observational data
Learners can design and demonstrate five or more simplified English expression strategies applicable to science curriculum instruction
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
